channel.title: Trucks Trailers on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Trucks Trailers on Universal

item.title: E00127
item.description: Ford F450, Service truck, V8 Powers stroke diesel engine, 5 speed manual transmission, LHD, standard cab, work bed, welder/generator including cables, fuel tank including pump, 2 air hose reels, bolt on crane, storage boxes, 235/85R16 Michelin tyres 70% remaining. Truck is in good and clean condition.

item.title: E00127
item.description: Ford F450, Service truck, V8 Powers stroke diesel engine, 5 speed manual transmission, LHD, standard cab, work bed, welder/generator including cables, fuel tank including pump, 2 air hose reels, bolt on crane, storage boxes, 235/85R16 Michelin tyres 70% remaining. item.description: Ford F450, Service truck, V8 Powers stroke diesel engine, 5 speed manual transmission, LHD, standard cab, work bed, welder/generator including cables, fuel tank including pump, 2 air hose reels, bolt on crane, storage boxes, 235/85R16 Michelin tyres 70% remaining. item.title: E01657
item.description: Nooteboom OSD47VVS 3 axle low bed trailer, 60 ton gross weight, steel suspension, 8.50mtr low bed length, 1.80mtr extendable, 2.5mtr width, winch, 8.25R15 Bridgestone tyres with approx. 75% remaining.2

item.title: E01709
item.description: 2 axle step frame trailer, 31510 kgs gross weight, 12.05 mtr length, 8.80 mtr low bed length, wooden floor, 265⁄70-19.5 tyres with approx. 80% remaining. Trailer is in very good and clean condition.

item.title: E02595
item.description: 2014 new build tray body fitted with twist locks fitted on 2008 used chassis, 88,150 kms, Palfinger 32080 crane fitted with 4 extensions c.w. radio remote control, front and rear telescopic jack legs, upright exhaust, 16 speed manual gearbox, new Pirelli 295/80R22.5 tyres fitted, Mounted on 2008 8x4 Hino 700 series (Very Low Kilometers), 420HP, airco, autolube, right hand drive. Truck is workshop tested and repaired. Truck is in very good and clean condition.

item.title: E02595
item.description: 2014 new build tray body fitted with twist locks fitted on 2008 used chassis, 88,150 kms, Palfinger 32080 crane fitted with 4 extensions c.w. radio remote control, front and rear telescopic jack legs, upright exhaust, 16 speed manual gearbox, new Pirelli 295/80R22.5 tyres fitted, Mounted on 2008 8x4 Hino 700 series (Very Low Kilometers), 420HP, airco, autolube, right hand drive. Truck is workshop tested and repaired. Truck is in very good and clean condition.

item.title: E02596
item.description: 2014 New manufactured cheese wedge bevertail machinery body, jack legs, fitted on 2008 Hino FYPUKA 700 3241 8x4 truck (Ex Goverment), 118,511 kms, upright exhaust, airco, sunvisor, new Pirelli 295/80R22.5 tyres fitted. 16 spd ZF Gearbox, flashing beacons, c.w. New manufactured cheese wedge bevertail machinery body, jack legs, 35,000 Kgs Design Gross Vehicle Weight, Tare Weight 12,800 Kgs, Design Payload 22,200 Kgs (Depending on local regulations), right hand drive. Truck is workshop inspected and repaired.

item.title: E03335
item.description: Hino 700FY with crane, 2007 8x4 Hino 700 series, 420HP, 221,464 kms, body with twist locks, HIAB 220C-5 crane fitted with 5 extensions c.w. radio remote control and rear legs, airco, upright exhaust, 16 speed manual gearbox, NEW Pirelli 295/80R22.5 tyres fitted, reverse camera, aluminium tool lockers, right hand drive. Truck is workshop tested and repaired. Truck is in very good and clean condition. Inspections are welcome!

item.title: E03335
item.description: Hino 700FY with crane, 2007 8x4 Hino 700 series, 420HP, 221,464 kms, body with twist locks, HIAB 220C-5 crane fitted with 5 extensions c.w. radio remote control and rear legs, airco, upright exhaust, 16 speed manual gearbox, NEW Pirelli 295/80R22.5 tyres fitted, reverse camera, aluminium tool lockers, right hand drive. Truck is workshop tested and repaired. Truck is in very good and clean condition. Inspections are welcome!

item.title: E03484
item.description: Montracon 3 axle semi curtain side trailer, ABS, back doors, sliding side, 13.7 Mtr length, 2.55 Mtr width, air suspension, 385/65R22.5 tyres, gross weight 39.000 Kgs. Trailer is in very good and clean condition.

item.title: E03990
item.description: Nooteboom MCO-97-06 Semi step frame trailer, 6 axles, hydraulic suspension, 12 Ton axles, 4 axles hydraulic steering, trailer width 2.72 Mtr, goose neck length 4.35 Mtr, loading deck length 11.95 Mtr, total length 16.30 Mtr, 285/70R19.5 tyres. Trailer is immediately available from stock, trailer needs some repairs. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04374
item.description: MAN TGS32.360 with TEKA concrete pump 42 Mtr, 476,740 km, cab with airconditioning, 8x4 configuration, manual gearbox, 295/80R22.5 tyres.

item.title: E04403
item.description: Massey Ferguson 575, 2-door cab, 3-gearlevels, 3-point linkage, PTO, hydr. spoolvalves, 7.50-18 front tyres, 13.6-28 rear tyres. Tractor is in ex farm- and clean condition.

item.title: E04576
item.description: AMS PowerProbe 9635 Geotechnical core drill, drill has only 1014 working hours, PTO powered, 175ft lb hydraulic hammer, high speed auger, high pressure pump, 10’ x 15” drill rod, direct push sampling, side-to-side and in-and-out slide base, hollow stem capabilities, 2-speed 5000 ft lb auger drive head, 80” probe stroke for use of up to 5’ tooling, 2400 psi-12GPM pump, hydraulic oil cooler, 33000 lb push down force, 47500 lb pull back force, adjustable mast for angled probing & drilling.

item.title: E04680
item.description: Hino 700FY tarspreader, RHD, twin burners, Rincheval 2.40 - 4.10 Mtr extendable spray bar, spray & distance meter + printer, 8x4 configuration, manual gearbox, 295/80R22.5 tyres, rear view camera. Truck comes straight out of work. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04690
item.description: Mercedes-Benz 1820 tarspreader, RHD, 2.40 Mtr spray bar, twin burners, hydraulic bitumen pump, 4x2 configuration, manual gearbox, 12R22.5 tyres on average 85% remaining. Truck is Ex Goverment and comes straight out of work. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04994
item.description: New and Unused Alpsan SCP329 Semi-lowbed trailer, 3 Axles, 12 Ton axles, gross weight 54 Ton, length 14.2 Mtr, width 2.55 Mtr, load platform length 8.9 Mtr, air suspension, dual tyres, one lift axle, 275/70R22.5 tyres, electro-hydraulic ramps, EBS air brake system, side extensions (300mm), 50mm thickness hard wooden floor and steel covered over tyres, CE marked. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04995
item.description: New and Unused GT Extendable semi-lowbed trailer, 4 axles, 12 Ton axles, gross weight 71 Ton, length 14 Mtr + 6 Mtr extendable, width 2.55 Mtr, load platform length 10 Mtr, 3 hydraulic steering axles, one lift axle, air suspension, dual tyres, 2 hydraulic outriggers, 235/75R17.5 tyres, side extensions (300mm), twist locks for 2 x 20 ft / 1 x 40 ft container, 2 wide storage boxes underneath, EBS air brake system, CE marked.

item.title: E04996
item.description: New and Unused Scorpion SCP329 Semi-lowbed trailer, 3 Axles, 12 Ton axles, gross weight 54 Ton, length 14.2 Mtr, width 3.0 Mtr, load platform length 8.85 Mtr, steel suspension, dual tyres, one lift axle, 275/70R22.5 tyres, electro-hydraulic ramps, EBS air brake system, side extensions (300mm), 50mm thickness hard wooden floor and steel covered over tyres, CE marked. Inspections are welcome.
